armor.megabotany.orichalcos_female.name: Pleiades Combat Maid Suit
armor.megabotany.orichalcos.desc0: 40% less Mana Cost on Mana Tools and Rods
armor.megabotany.orichalcos.set_bonus: When worn as a full set:
armor.megabotany.shadowium.name: Shadow Warrior
armor.megabotany.shadowium.desc0: 30% less Mana Cost on Mana Tools and Rods
armor.megabotany.shadowium.desc1: Unlock set bonus stats at night
armor.megabotany.shadowium.set_bonus: When worn as a full set at night:
armor.megabotany.photonium.name: Goblin Slayer
armor.megabotany.photonium.desc0: 30% less Mana Cost on Mana Tools and Rods
armor.megabotany.photonium.desc1: Unlock set bonus stats during the day
armor.megabotany.photonium.set_bonus: When worn as a full set during the day:
armor.megabotany.manaweavedsteel.name: Starry Idol
armor.megabotany.manaweavedsteel.desc0: 50% less Mana Cost on Mana Tools and Rods
wings_comment: all of the wings unique to the God Core use the old name which are probably going to change
megabotany.page.bottled_flame0: The $(item)Flame in a Bottle$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that once equipped, places torches automatically when the light level around the wearer becomes to low for a small amount of $(thing)Mana$(0).
megabotany.page.frost_ring0: $(item)Jack Frost's Ring$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that uses $(thing)Mana$(0) to freezes anything that can be frozen under the user's feet once equipped.$(p)This item is much more powerful than the $(item)Snowflake Pendant$(0), it can freeze things that are really hot and anything frozen by it will stay permanently frozen.
megabotany.page.god_core0: The $(item)God's Core$(0) is a the upgraded version of the $(item)Flügel Tiara$(0). This new version allows for the user to fly an infinite amount of time as long as they have enough mana to sustain the increased $(thing)Mana$(0) demand.$(p)5 new wings are available as well as the ones available for the $(item)Flügel Tiara$(3)
megabotany.page.god_core1: The person with that knowledge wins
megabotany.page.jingwei_feather0: $(item)Jingwei's Feather$(0) allows the user to fire $(thing)Mana Bursts$(0) when equipped. Theses bursts can be shot by the user by left clicking while holding nothing in his hand. Once shot, the $(thing)Mana$(0) burst will go in a straight line util it runs out of $(thing)Mana$(0) hits an entity damaging it.
megabotany.page.jingwei_feather1: A million years would not be enough to fill the sea with stones
megabotany.page.jump_amulet0: The $(item)Jump Amulet$(0) is the upgraded version of the $(item)Cirrus Amulet$ allowing the user to $(thing)triple-jump$(0) when worn.
megabotany.page.mana_drive_ring0: The $(item)Mana Drive Ring$(0) Releases the user's mana in the air. This allows for nearby $(thing)functional flowers$ to be filled by the user's $(thing) mana.
megabotany.page.mana_drive_ring1: Spirit circuits are all around the world
megabotany.page.master_band_of_mana0: The $(item)Master Band of Mana$(0) is the final evolution of the $(item)band of mana$. This ring is capable of storing an amount of $(thing)Mana$ so big that you probably will never be able to completely fill it.
megabotany.page.pure_daisy_pendant0: The $(item)Pure Daisy Pendant$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that allows its user when worn to use the concentrate the energy of pure daisies to purify blocks. The user needs to hold Left Click on a block to purify, the time taken for its purification is much shorter than a pure daisy flower would take, but only one block can be purified at a time using the pendant.
megabotany.page.pure_daisy_pendant1: Time is but a human construct
megabotany.page.super_crown0: The $(item)Super Crown$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that once worn reduces incoming damage by 10%. It is capable of doing so because it also makes the user's size be 10% bigger than normal.
megabotany.page.wall_climb_amulet0: The $(item)Wall Climb Amulet$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that once worn allows it's user to climb any wall like a spider would.
megabotany.page.wall_climb_amulet1: The not so itsy bitsy spider
megabotany.page.wall_jump_amulet0: The $(item)Wall Jump Amulet$(0) is a $(thing)Trinket$(0) that once worn allows it's user to defy gravity by doing parkour to climb wall. It essentially allow it's user to jump against the side of any block he is colliding with.
megabotany.page.annoying_flower0: Any good fisherman knows that patience is the key to get a good catch. The $(item)Annoying Flower$(0) will do all the waiting and fishing making sure to give all the junk it can find to the fisherman.
megabotany.page.enchanted_orchid0: The $(item)Enchanted Orchid$(0) after some time, converts the $(item)Grass$(0) that is under it to $(item)Enchanted Soil$(0) for a hefty amount of mana.
megabotany.page.enchanted_orchid1: it's just a matter of time
megabotany.page.manalinkium0: Every adventurer has at some point wished for a way to send $(thing)Mana$(0) across large distance or even dimensions. When two (item)Manalinkium$(0) are connected together, they bend space-time allowing them to share mana between each other. $(p) This mechanic only works if both flower are within loaded chunks because of the $(thing)axiom of chunkloading$(0).
megabotany.page.mirrortunia0: The $(item)Mirrortunia$(0) is a greedy flower that uses $(thing)Mana$(0) to absorbs any effects that would be applied to an entity within its reach and does WIP with it.
megabotany.page.necrofleur0: The $(item)Necrofleur$(0) is a simple flower that uses $(thing)Mana$(0) prevents any nearby entity from being able to heal.
megabotany.page.stardust_lotus0: Every adventurer has at some point wished for a way to travel across long distance or even dimensions instantly. When two (item)Stardust Lotus(0) are connected together, they bend space-time allowing for an entity to travel between them. $(p) This mechanic only works if both flower are within loaded chunks because of the $(thing)axiom of chunkloading$(0).
megabotany.page.bell_flower1: Can you stop making so much noise?
megabotany.page.bloody_enchantress1: Say that again and I'll kill you
megabotany.page.gemini_orchid0: The $(item)Gemini Orchid$(0) generates $(thing)Mana$ from the heat difference between blocks or liquids near it. The greater that heat difference heat is the more $(thing)Mana$(0) it generates and vice-versa.
megabotany.page.gemini_orchid1: Where fire meets ice, magic awakens
megabotany.page.moonlight_lily0: The $(item)Moonlight lily$(0) is a flower that generates small amount of $(thing)Mana$(0) by absorbing the light from the moon.
megabotany.page.omniviolet0: The $(item)Omniviolet$(0) in it's infinite quest of knowledge will take any enchanted book and generate $(thing)Mana$ for it. The higher the level of the enchantment is the more $(thing)Mana$(0) it will generate in return.
megabotany.page.omniviolet1: I have nothing worth 10,000 books from another world
megabotany.page.reikar_lily0: The $(item)Reikar Lily$(0) is a mystical flower that is somehow capable of attracting lighting to it during storms and of harvesting the energy it contains to produce large amounts of $(thing)Mana$(0).
megabotany.page.reikar_lily1: lightning never strikes the same place twice, Right?
megabotany.page.sunshine_lily0: The $(item)Sunshine Lily$(0) is a flower that generates small amount of $(thing)Mana$(0) by absorbing the light from the sun.
megabotany.page.sunshine_lily1: The sun's gift is life itself
megabotany.page.tinkle0: The $(item)Tinkle$(0) is a flower that generate a very small amount of $(thing)Mana$(0) when someone dances around it.
megabotany.page.absolution_pendant0: The $(item)Absolution Pendant$(0) is a powerful relics that is capable of blocking any damage the user receives using $(thing)Mana$(0). Once it blocks an damage for it's user, it goes on a one minute cooldown.
megabotany.page.achilles_shield0: $(item)Achilles' Shield$(0) is a mythical relic left behind by the great hero Achilles. This powerful relic of the past reflects any projectile aimed at it back towards it's sender and pushes away any entity attacking it doing 20% of the negated damage back to them.
megabotany.page.all_for_one0: The relic known as $(item)All For One$(0) is a mysterious relic that seems to be capable of absorbing the power of $(thing)Trinkets$(0). Once equipped, it gives it's user access to all the power it contains if it has absorbed any, otherwise it is completely useless.
megabotany.page.excalibur0: The legendary sword of King Arthur also known as $(item)excalibur$(0) is a relic that gives it's wielder unimaginable power. This sword allows it wielder to shoot burst of mana that will automatically aim towards the nearest living entity and damage them if collided with.$(p)Only those it deems worthy of it can wield it
megabotany.page.failnaught0: The last elven king's bow known as $(item)Failnaught$(0) is said to be a relic that never fails its wielder. Rumors has it that it does not even uses arrow but instead mana to shoot burst of mana which go faster and do more damage than any arrow could possibly.
megabotany.page.holy_grail0: The $(item)Holy Grail$(0) is a legendary relic that nobody seems to rely know what it looks like. Some says that it is in the shape of a cup you could drink from, other says that it doesn't have a physical form and can transform in anything the user could need an infinite drink for.$(p) While it may be infinite, apparently, the more it is used in a day, the more many it consumes to fill back up.
